response.original_title: the Christmas Yule Log with the holiday season's greatest music as perfomed by Dennis Awe: A Virtual Fireplace
response.overview: The burning of the Yule Log is a timeless tradition which has its roots in Scandanavia. It was believed that ashes from the Yule Log possessed magical powers... In village homes, each family member would take a turn celebrating the Yule Log by singing a Christmas Song!  Today, the burning of the Yule Log celebrates the warmth & love of the Holiday Season.  A new tradition has emerged, as family members now watch the Yule Log burning while listening to traditional Holiday Music. Many families decorate their Christmas Tree as the Yule Log burns... whether in their fireplace or watching the flames jump and embers fly on their television screen or monitor.  The fireplace you will see on this DVD is the warm hearth at the home of Dennis Awe. During the Holiday Season, Dennis and his family spend many pleasant evenings enjoying the Yule Log Fireside. Dennis invites you to join him and savor the holiday season as he plays your most cherished Christmas Holiday Melodies.
response.tagline: Enjoy the sights and sounds of a real wood fire on your TV!
response.title: the Christmas Yule Log with the holiday season's greatest music as perfomed by Dennis Awe: A Virtual Fireplace
